text:
TaskRabbit | Fullstack React.js / Ruby Engineer | San Francisco | Onsite | Visa considered | https://www.taskrabbit.com/careers

Every single day brings more chores and less time. Whether someone needs a handyman, house cleaner, mover or delivery person, TaskRabbit delights clients by finding the right skilled person in minutes. On the other side of the marketplace, Taskers earn a living by setting their own prices and defining their working hours. They have control to help people when and how they want in the most supportive marketplace.

Our goal is to revolutionize how people work. Our culture is collaborative, pragmatic, and dynamic. We're looking for talented, entrepreneurially-minded and analytical people who have a real passion for helping people do what they loveâ€”and have fun while on the journey.
